title: Appellant enforcement submission properties
description: Schema defining any properties for enforcement appeals

submissionId.description: Case submission id - link to draft submission created by appellant

caseProcedure.description: The type of procedure for the appeal

lpaCode.description: A unique identifier for the Local Planning Authority
lpaCode.$comment: Uses the internal PINS code identifying LPAs

caseSubmittedDate.description: The date the appeal was submitted by the appellant

enforcementNotice.description: Indicates if an enforcement notice is the reason for the appeal

enforcementReference.description: The unique identifier of the enforcement notice

enforcementIssueDate.description: The date the enforcement notice was issued

enforcementEffectiveDate.description: The date the enforcement notice took effect

contactPlanningInspectorateDate.description: The date the enforcement notice took effect

interestInLand.description: The individual's interest in the appeal land

writtenOrVerbalPermission.description: If required, whether the individual has permission to use the appeal land

descriptionOfAllegedBreach.description: A description of the alleged breach

applicationMadeAndFeePaid.description: Whether a planning application was made

retrospectiveApplication.description: Whether a retrospective planning application was made

groundAFeePaid.description: Whether a ground (a) fee has been paid

applicationDevelopmentAllOrPart.description: Did the application relate to all or part of the development

originalDevelopmentDescription.description: A description of the proposed development

changedDevelopmentDescription.description: An updated description of the proposed development

applicationReference.description: The unique identifier of the LPA application

applicationDate.description: The date of the original LPA application

applicationDecision.description: The outcome of the original LPA decision

applicationDecisionDate.description: The date of the original LPA decision

applicationDecisionAppealed.description: Whether an appeal was made against the original LPA decision

appealDecisionDate.description: The date of the appeal against the original LPA decision

caseSubmissionDueDate.description: The statutory deadline for submitting an appeal from the original LPA decision date

siteAddressLine1.description: First line of address for the appeal site

siteAddressLine2.description: Second line of address for the appeal site

siteAddressTown.description: Town / City of the site address

siteAddressPostcode.description: Postal code of the site address

contactAddressLine1.description: First line of address for the appeal site

contactAddressLine2.description: Second line of address for the appeal site

contactAddressTown.description: Town / City of the site address

contactAddressPostcode.description: Postal code of the site address

examples: The site is accessible through the small gate on the left of the property
There is an aggressive dog in the property

siteSafetyDetails.description: Provided information on site health and safety

appellantCostsAppliedFor.description: Indicates if the appellant has applied for costs

appellantProcedurePreference.description: The procedure preference indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceDetails.description: The procedure details preference indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceDuration.description: The duration of the procedure indicated by the appellant

appellantProcedurePreferenceWitnessCount.description: The number of witnesses appellant has suggested for inquiries preference

statusPlanningObligation.description: The planning obligation information, if available

nearbyCaseReferences.description: A list of related case references known to the appellant and the LPA

interestInLand.description: Individual's interest in the appeal land

writtenOrVerbalPermission.description: Whether the individual has permission to use the land

namedIndividuals.description: A list of individuals named on the enforcement notice

appealGrounds.description: A list of appeal grounds being pleaded
